idea.title: Crew St.
idea.pitch: It is a platform which makes it easier for entrepreneurs to assemble teams and helps individuals find the most suitable projects.
idea.descriptions:
Users will have a unique opportunity to bring their idea to life with like-minded people from a friendly and diverse community. 
Therefore, whether they want to develop a mobile application or create their own animated series, they will find the most suitable idea and team!

Right now project is in an early stage of development and we are still searching for people who'd like to join our team.
